sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {clearItemFromCart,addItem,removeItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import {CheckoutItemContainer,ImageContainer,ItemImage,ItemSpan} from './checkout-item.styles' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem,clearItem,addItem,removeItem}) => { const {name,imageUrl,price,quantity} = cartItem; return( {name}
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 {price}
clearItem(cartItem)} className='remove-button'>✕
 )} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch=>({ clearItem:item=>dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem:item=>dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem:item=>dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem);
